page.title: 17ENTERTAINMENT
page.content: {THE ABERAMAN PUBLIC HALL. Two buildings dominate the survey area: St. Elvan's Church and Aberaman Public Hall. The foundations of the present building were laid in 1907 although the facility began in old colliery buildings supported by contributions paid by the colliers.The original building contained a reading room,library,theatre and swimming pool.In recent years the building has fallen into a state of disrepair.The theatre which was also used as a cinema and a Bingo hall has been closed. However,there is new hope for the building as the theatre is now being refurbished for live theatre and cinema.There are no cinemas in the area at present.There are also hopes that the rest of the building will become a community centre.
